com.vechain.thorclient.service

Interface BlockchainAPI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockchainAPIImpl

    public interface BlockchainAPI
    The Blockchain API is a service interface for client to get or post request to the remote blockchain url. The client must set NodeProvider at first.

      • getBalance

        Account getBalance(java.lang.String accountAddr,
                   java.lang.String revision)
            throws java.io.IOException
        get balance from an address and block revision.
        Parameters:
        accountAddr - the account address, a hex string like "0x7567D83b7b8d80ADdCb281A71d54Fc7B3364ffed"
        revision - it could be null or blockId with prefix 0x, or block number or "best".
        Returns:
        Account
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        Get storage at account address
        Parameters:
        accountAddr - required, a hex string.
        key - required, sha3(input = "64 address"+"64 variable position")
        revision - optional
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getTransaction

        Transaction getTransaction(java.lang.String txId,
                           boolean isRaw,
                           java.lang.String revision)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        get transaction by transaction
        Parameters:
        txId - transaction id hex string which is blake2b hash of sign hash byte array appending signer address byte array.
        isRaw - true the return value is rlp encoded, false the return value is transaction.
        revision - the block revision which is block number, block id or "best", could be null.
        Returns:
        Transaction
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getTransactionReceipt

        Receipt getTransactionReceipt(java.lang.String txId,
                              java.lang.String revision)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        get transaction receipt
        Parameters:
        txId - transaction id hex string which is blake2b hash of sign hash byte array appending signer address byte array.
        revision - block revision which is block number, block id or "best", could be null.
        Returns:
        Receipt
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getTransactionReceipt

        get transaction receipt
        Parameters:

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getChainTag

        byte getChainTag()
          throws java.io.IOException
        get chain tag which is the last byte of genesis block id.
        Returns:
        the tag of blockchain which is the last byte of genesis block id. If return -1 then it is failed.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getBestBlockRef

                throws java.io.IOException
        get block reference from best block
        Returns:
        8 bytes length byte array which is the best block reference.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
